import React,{useState} from 'react' import { Card, CloseButton, Container } from 'react-bootstrap' import AddForm from './AddForm' import SidebarListChar from './SidebarListChar' import { allCharacters } from './sources' import './styledComponents/Character.css' import {picture} from "./character-2.png" function Character() { const [isOpen, setisOpen] = useState(false) const [value, setValue] = useState({}) const rollit = ( person ) => { setisOpen(true) setValue({ title: person.title, friend: person.friend }) } return (
{ allCharacters.map(each=>( rollit( each )}>

{each.title}

Friends: {each.friend}
 )) }
{ isOpen?
setisOpen(false)} className="ms-auto" />

{value.title}

{value.title} is really a nice Person. She's been living on planet Alpha for 10 years

Planet
Alpha
Friends
{value.friend}
FRIENDS
:"" }
) } export default Character
